It was released for the [[SNES]], [[Windows]], [[Game Boy]] and [[Game Boy Color]] by the late 1997 and 2001. ==Gameplay== [[Image:Prisoners of the Sun (PC game) - Beginning of the first level.png|thumb|left|The beginning of the first level]] The gameplay to this game is similar the other two Tintin games released previously - ''[[Tintin in Tibet (video game)|Tintin in Tibet]]'' and ''[[Tintin: Destination Adventure]]''.
